detailsOfAchievement: Nav Prabhat Jan Sewa Sansthan is a Non profit organization registered under Societies Registration Act 1860.The organization is engaged in the field of child welfare,education, vocational tarining to women & their welfare,Micro finance (SHGs),Awarness through Cultural programsand Environment.The organization is actively working in the field of child protection and overall development of the street children, disabled children , Railway platform children, child labour, orphaned, child beggar and other needy children of the society. The organization is actively working in Faizabad, Sultanpur, Ambedkar Nagar and Delhi areas. Under the different projects run by the organization, children are being supported in obtaining proper education, good health, vocational training in different courses by offering them good living condition, by protecting their rights, child abuse and extend them best possible support in order to ensure them justice. The organization runs a school where free education is offered to the needy children in Faizabad. Organization regularly organizes Seminar on the same issue related to Women empowerment, Girl Child Ratio, Health & Nutrition and Energy saving. Organization also run Family Counseling Centre (FCC)at Ayodhya Faizabad a programe of CSWB New Delhi, to help problems of Domestic Violence, Family discord, dawry related issues and career counseling. Organisation has experienced members in different specialties for on going work such as rural development, awareness programs and computer education etc.
